title: My Main account is either being hacked, or taken control of. Cause I cannot access it any more.

embed.description: XxJiggaloxX / Silver 2 0LP / 24W 15L Win Ratio 62% / Jinx - 8W 3L Win Ratio 73%, Veigar - 5W 2L Win Ratio 71%, Twitch - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Caitlyn - 2W 2L Win Ratio 50%, Illaoi - 1W 1L Win Ratio 50%

body:
My account for the past 2 weeks has been stuck in this "Your account is in the process of transferring." When I DID NOT authorize this to happen nor did I have any issues involving account security or alerts to my email since it started. I made a ticket but nothing happened since you required more info upon more info about stuff involving my first ever 5 champions picked.. Like i'm going to remember that I've had this account for years. And I haven't gotten a reply back to the newly developed info I had to reply with and I'm afraid my account is going to be lost and I've delved A LOT of time into my main account "XxJiggaloxX". 

Speaking of the issues with my account also I can't log into it any longer on the official website. It says no account with that name or info exists. Yet I know my account is still there cause look at the Na.op.gg link. I just want to play league....   {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I looked into this for you and see that an account recovery specialist is helping you out in your ticket.  I see your most recent reply, and your specialist will get back to you after further review as soon as able.  In the meantime, I high suggest going through the[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your information is safe in and outside of league.  Hang tight until then!
